welcome_message: Welcome to the dbt template for Databricks Asset Bundles!

project_name.pattern_match_failure_message: Name must consist of letters, numbers, and underscores.
project_name.description:
Please provide a unique name for this project.
project_name

http_path.pattern_match_failure_message: Path must be of the form /sql/1.0/warehouses/abcdef1234567890
http_path.description:
Please provide the HTTP Path of the SQL warehouse you would like to use with dbt during development
You can find this path by clicking on "Connection Details" for your SQL warehouse.
http_path [example: /sql/1.0/warehouses/abcdef1234567890]

catalog.description:
Please provide an initial catalog (leave blank if you would not want to use an initial catalog).
catalog

schema.description:
Please provide a default schema for this project.
Note that you can pick a different schema for local development when you first use the 'dbt init' command.
schema

success_message:
ðŸ“Š Your new project has been created in the '{{.project_name}}' directory!
Please refer to the README.md file for "getting started" instructions.
